golgui.utils

Class LocalFileOperator

  • java.lang.Object
    • golgui.utils.LocalFileOperator

  • public class LocalFileOperator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an object that the application uses to handle the interaction with local files.
    Version:
    1.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String directory
      The path of the root directory of the file.
      private java.lang.String fileName
      The name of the local file.
      private java.nio.file.Path fullPath
      Contains the absolute path of the local file if the file can be found at that path, or the path from user's input if such file cannot be found.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileOperator(java.lang.String inputPath)
      Constructor that creates a LocalFileOperator.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String alertIoException(java.io.IOException e)
      This function generates the alert message when the application faces an IOException.
      java.io.File browseInputFile(javax.swing.JFrame frame, javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter... extensions)
      This function creates a file chooser and let the user choose a file as an input file.
      java.io.File browseOutputFile(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      This function creates a file chooser and let the user choose a file as an output file.
      java.io.File browseOutputFolder(javax.swing.JFrame frame)
      This function creates a file chooser and let the user choose a folder as an output folder.
      java.lang.String getDirectory()
      This function returns the directory of the local file from user's input.
      java.lang.String getFileName()
      This function returns the filename of the local file from user's input.
      static java.lang.String getRelativePath(java.lang.String targetPath)
      This function gets a relative path for an absolute path.

    • Field Detail

      • fullPath

        private java.nio.file.Path fullPath
        Contains the absolute path of the local file if the file can be found at that path, or the path from user's input if such file cannot be found.

      • fileName

        private final java.lang.String fileName
        The name of the local file.

      • directory

        private final java.lang.String directory
        The path of the root directory of the file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalFileOperator

        public LocalFileOperator(java.lang.String inputPath)
        Constructor that creates a LocalFileOperator.

        - requires: None

        - modifies: fullPath, fileName, directory

        - effects: For example, input "data/sample.txt" will create fullPath = "C:\User\....\data\sample.txt" fileName = "sample.txt" directory = "C::\User\....\data\"

        Parameters:
        inputPath - the path which user inputs

    • Method Detail

      • browseInputFile

        public java.io.File browseInputFile(javax.swing.JFrame frame,
                                    javax.swing.filechooser.FileNameExtensionFilter... extensions)
        This function creates a file chooser and let the user choose a file as an input file.

        - requires: None

        - modifies: None

        - effects: None

        Parameters:
        frame - the GUI window
        extensions - the available file extension filters
        Returns:
        the file chose by user, null if nothing was chosen
